column3: There shall be a 3-year grace period for the land rent. The rent during this period will be prorated over the remaining years annually, commencing from the date of execution of the agreement. After 3 years, the annual lease rate per hectare for use of agricultural investment shall be birr 158 per hectare (making a total of birr 3,160,000 for all hectares). The total amount payment of contract shall be birr 79,000,000. There shall be 1 year down payment for the concession land. The Ministry of Agriculture reserves the right to revise the lease payment rate as the need may arise. Once the annual land lease rent becomes payable upon completion of the grace period, Horizon Plantations has the obligation to settle the current annual land rent, including the prorated amount of the grace period, to the regions where the land is located during the months December up to June every year as per predetermined lease rate for rural lands.
